So you want to enhance your weapon, huh? Not a bad idea. Really, expensive weapons aren't necessarily the best, you know? It all depends on how well it suits ya.
And no need to worry about enchants disappearing! Oh, they'll stay all right.
Check out the item info for their new abilities. And don't forget, you'll only see the weapons you have!
By the way, if you have A-grade or above...I can't help ya. It's just beyond us, you know? Maybe the legendary Blacksmith of Mammon might be able to do something about it.
Oh, and the Blacksmith of Mammon will be able to help you remove powers from your weapon too. Rumors say the Black Marketeer of Mammon learned how to do that from the blacksmith, so there's that too.
Well, enough talking. Pick the weapon you want to enhance!
Choose the capabilities you wish to add to your weapons!
